title: of the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Corporate
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Corporate 

Sustainability Reporting) (No. 2) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (corporate sustainability reporting) (no 2) regulation 2024

title: of the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: In these Regulations, “Principal Act” means the Companies Act 2014
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Principal Act” means the Companies Act 2014 

(No. 38 of 2014).
text_norm: 2 regulation principal act mean company act 2014 (no 38 2014)

title: of the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: 3. Section 1587 of the Principal Act is amended, in subsection (2), by the
text_raw:
3. Section 1587 of the Principal Act is amended, in subsection (2), by the 

substitution of “Chapter 3, other than section 1607,” for “Chapter 3”.
text_norm: 3 section 1587 principal act amended subsection (2) substitution chapter 3 section 1607 chapter 3

title: of the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: 4. Section 1594 of the Principal Act is amended by the substitution of the
text_raw:
4. Section 1594 of the Principal Act is amended by the substitution of the 

following for subsection (4): 

“(4) This section shall not apply to an applicable company that – 

(a) 

(b) 

falls within paragraph (a) of the definition of ‘applicable 
company’, and 

is a public-interest entity falling within paragraph (a) of the 
definition of ‘public-interest entities’.”.
text_norm: 4 section 1594 principal act amended substitution following subsection (4) (4) section shall apply applicable company - (a) (b) fall within paragraph (a) definition applicable company public-interest entity falling within paragraph (a) definition public-interest entity

title: of the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: 5. Section 1598 of the Principal Act is amended by the substitution of the
text_raw:
5. Section 1598 of the Principal Act is amended by the substitution of the 

following for subsection (4): 

“(4) This section shall not apply to an applicable holding company that is a 
public-interest entity falling within paragraph (a) of the definition of ‘publicinterest entities’.”. 

1 OJ No. L 322, 16.12.2022, p. 15 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [498] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 October, 2024. 

PETER BURKE, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [498]

title: of the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations make amendments further to the European Union (Corporate 
Sustainability Reporting) Regulations 2024 S.I. No. 336/2024.
